summary: Cannot test pagination due to module resolution errors preventing dashboard from running

failures.expected: Dashboard runs on port 3134 without errors
failures.actual: Module not found: Can't resolve '@ghost-greeter/domain' - preventing all pages from loading

details.impact: Cannot access any pages including login, admin/calls, or dashboard/calls to test pagination

partial_test_results.brainstorming: Completed - identified all potential failure modes
partial_test_results.test_plan: Completed - comprehensive plan created for both API and UI testing
partial_test_results.api_testing: Blocked - authentication required but cannot access login page
partial_test_results.ui_testing: Blocked - Playwright cannot navigate to any pages due to build errors

pagination_code_review.acceptance_criteria_likely_met: Code shows pagination implementation with page/limit parameters and UI controls

suggested_fix.title: Fix module resolution errors in TKT-034 branch
suggested_fix.description: The @ghost-greeter/domain package exists but isn't being resolved correctly. This may be a pnpm workspace issue or tsconfig path mapping problem.
steps: Verify pnpm workspace configuration is correct
Ensure all dependencies are properly installed
